titles.title: To impose an additional duty on imported goods and to provide that amounts equal to the revenues delivered therefrom be available for the national health care purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 10/12/1993--Introduced. Imposes an additional duty of four percent ad valorem on imported goods. Establishes within the Treasury the National Health Care Trust Fund consisting of the duties imposed under this Act.
